New Records: Nikola Vucevic scored 23 points, grabbed 10 rebounds, and had six assists in the Bulls' game against the Jazz, a significant performance for the Bulls as they suffered a loss
Key Match Events: The Bulls lost to the Jazz, marking their first game, with Vucevic's performance being a turning point
Post-Match Reflections: Bulls head coach Billy Donovan praised Vucevic's performance and play, emphasizing his impact on both ends of the floor; Vucevic expressed satisfaction with his performance and adjustments made over the summer
